programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: Engineer Rob Bell offers an insight into the history, design and building process of the Britannia Bridge, across the Menai Strait between the island of Anglesey and the mainland of Wales. The difficult task of building the 100ft iron structure was taken up by civil engineer Robert Stephenson and his team, including William Fairbairn and Eaton Hodgkinson. But in May 1970, four youths set light to the famous bridge, and Rob meets a fireman who fought the blaze that fateful night.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers with Alan Davies
programme.desc: The RSPCA are called to the aid of elderly crossbreed Ben. Although inspector Anthony has been told that Ben is riddled with fleas, the sight that awaits him is enough to shock even an experienced inspector. Meanwhile, in Lancashire, a struggling couple must improve their living conditions or face losing their beloved Bichon Frise for good.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi heads to Colliters Brook Farm near Bristol, to try to make sense of owner Richard's struggling business and help make his dream a reality. After being forced to run a makeshift B&B from the farmhouse instead of his original plan to renovate an old barn on his property, Richard has been trying hard to get his dream back on track, but crippling debts have led to him being stuck in a rut, with no clear direction. Alex can see huge potential the farm, but getting Richard to pull everything together and maximise his profits proves one of her toughest challenges to date.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother

programme.title: Shock Docs
programme.desc: Light-hearted documentary shedding light on the lives of people whose extravagant tastes often leave their parents or significant others substantially out of pocket. These so-called `divas' are more than willing to throw tantrums, manipulate relatives and resort to emotional blackmail to get what they want. Among the pampered persons highlighted are shopping-obsessive Janey, who withholds sex from her fiance as a means of getting access to his bank account, and ambitious teen Romy, who demands her mother supply her with a `big budget' wardrobe to match her big dreams. Also featured is apprentice hairdresser Matthew, who plans to emulate the camp excess of Lady Gaga as a performer, much to the dismay of long-suffering boyfriend Dylan.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Eamonn & Ruth: How the Other Half Lives
programme.desc: Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford delve into the world of the landed gentry, trying their hands at clay-pigeon shooting with hand-engraved shotguns worth £100,000 each. The Queen's former butler instructs them in the subtle art of etiquette, while Her Majesty's official sculptor immortalises Eamonn's head in a traditional clay bust, before the couple find themselves partying with the daughters of high society at the elegant and exclusive Debutante's Ball.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya is shaken by Willow's return, and fears her mother may also be back. The trolls come out in droves to abuse Piper online and Tyler is outraged on her behalf.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While performing an autopsy for a class of military students, Ducky discovers the cadaver he is using is the body of a murder victim. In trying to identify the corpse, Gibbs and his team are set on the trail of a career criminal specialising in identity fraud. Meanwhile, Ziva has difficulty separating her personal feelings and professional judgment. Starring David McCallum and Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Rags to Riches: Ultimate Life
programme.desc: Jason Stevens is busy running his grandfather's foundation, while also having to fend off lawsuits from his extended family and lament a fleeing lover. When an inherited journal magically sends him back to 1941, it provides an unparalleled opportunity for him to witness the true rags-to-riches story of his late grandfather. Drama, starring Logan Bartholomew and Peter Fonda.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours

programme.desc: Tori drinks from the jug Zannis tampered with and falls ill, John makes an appointment with a psychiatrist, and Ash is increasingly resentful about Kat's prioritising work over Luc.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.desc: In Scarborough, the police stop and search a car they suspect may be carrying drugs, but the stakes are raised very quickly when weapons are found, while in a village near Selby, the North Yorkshire road crime team arrests a teenager him for dealing marijuana. In Bradford, traffic cops help the drug squad chase down a class-A drugs dealer, while another team tracks a suspicious character into the toilets of a fast food outlet.(n)

programme.title: The Highland Midwife
programme.desc: In the north of Scotland, Morven closely monitors mum-to-be Emma, who has a history of delivering large babies that require a Caesarean section, while in Campbeltown on the west coast, Susanna gets closer to her dream of a big family as midwife Helen tries to help her have a local birth without pain relief.(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.sub-title: The Bubble Wrap Boy: Extraordinary People.
programme.desc: The story of 16-year-old Mithun Chauhan, who suffers from an extremely rare genetic condition that has left him with large swollen lumps all over his face and body. His disfigurement has led to the creation of a rumour that his village has become home to a reclusive monster. The condition, known as neurofibroma, affects one in 33,000 people and causes tumours to grow along the nerve endings, with Mithun's case among the most extreme ever discovered.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the live Big Brother companion show, including a debate on the burning issues and celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments.(n)

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune(n)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: Roman Polanksi's Oscar-winning World War II drama. When the Germans invade Poland, a celebrated pianist loses his job becaust he is Jewish, but as the Nazis tighten their grip on Warsaw, his family are thrown out of their home and forced to live in the ghetto. As conditions turn even more nightmarish, the pianist hides in the ruined city, dodging the squads who carry off Jews to the death camps(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion in the Gulf of Mexico that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A scientist survives a mankind-destroying virus and struggles to live in a New York City overflowing with cannibalistic zombies that come out only at night. Based on the 1954 sci-fi classic novel by Richard Matheson(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Wall Street Banker Jack Campbell has it all: more cash than he can shake a stick at, oodles of power and, above all, his freedom. But on Christmas Eve he challenges an armed robber, then on Christmas Day he wakes up to the life he would have had if he'd stayed with his college girlfriend: two noisy kids, a dead-end job selling tyres, and a people carrier instead of his Ferrari. At first he's horrified(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: An aging football coach finds himself struggling with his personal and professional life while trying to hold his team together. A star quarterback has been knocked out of the game and a naive football player replaces him only to become exposed to the world of sports and become a danger to himself and to his players. Meanwhile, the coach finds himself constantly at battle with the team owner's money and power hungry daughter intent on moving the team out(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: A veteran detective's search for a serial killer yields a seductive suspect(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A sexy thriller about divers who find themselves battling sharks and ruthless criminals after discovering hidden treasure and a crashed plane loaded with cocaine(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Eligible young people in New York City search for romance while living the single life with their friends(n)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: One-hit wonder Jackie Moon uses his musical earnings to buy a basketball team, but must fight to keep his side in the game(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Widescreen Sci-fi sequel in which Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) wakes up after 57 years in suspended animation to discover that the alien nightmare is beginning all over again. The planet where the original alien was discovered is now home to a small colony of humans, which has recently stopped transmitting signals to the outside world(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site 25 years later(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Tense thriller. Car thief Memphis Raines is forced to steal 50 luxury vehicles in one night in order to save the life of his brother, who has fallen foul of a dangerous crime lord. Once the most successful car thief in California, Raines must reassemble his old gang to fulfil the almost impossible mission. His task is further hampered by a rival band of thieves and the local police(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: The self-styled sexiest spy in the world travels back to the 1960s after his nemesis steals his most treasured possession: his 'mojo'. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: A mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In this brutal survival tale based on a true story, 19th-century frontiersman Hugh Glass is betrayed and left for dead by his fur-trapping party after he is viciously attacked by a grizzly bear. However, Glass survives and sets out to seek revenge(n)

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: Atmospheric western about a lone, gun-toting preacher who defends a settlement from attack. In the late 1800s, a young girl witnesses a violent attack on a gold-mining settlement and prays for a miracle to save the camp and its people. Her prayers seem answered when a stranger arrives and helps the prospectors defend themselves. But his real motives are a mystery(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: WWE star John Cena headlines his sophomore action picture as a police officer whose wife is kidnapped in New Orleans. Daniel Kunka provides the script, with Deep Blue Sea's Renny Harlin handling the directing duties for the 20-million-dollar Fox Atomic/WWE Films production(n)

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Warrant Officer Ellen Ripley crash-lands on a remote prison planet and must once again fight for her life against the deadly Alien creature(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: In this thrilling action flick set in Paris, a maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket as they investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making John perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: Hereafter tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. On the other side of the world, Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each on a path in search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: CIA agent Jack Ryan races to avert war between Russia and the US after a terrorist threatens to detonate a nuclear bomb(n)

programme.desc: Timmy! 2000. The over-prescribing of Ritalin is satirized in this more irreverent than average episode of South Park. Soon the entire childhood population of South Park has been diagnosed the same way. Timmy ends up singing lead with a local metal band, Lords of the Underworld, while the Ritalin has made the children increase their appreciation of Phil Collins. Luckily, Chef saves the day for everyone. programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: A Murder in Greenwich: The Martha Moxley Case
programme.desc: A Murder in Greenwich: The Martha Moxley Case. (@A&E) investigates the untouchables in American Justice: Martha Moxley. In the 1970s, as today, the Kennedy name carried a lot of clout. Its clan members were a hounded and romanticized group. But when trouble strikes too close to home, someone must be held accountable. Martha Moxley was an energetic teenager who resided in the prestigious neighborhood of Belle Haven in Greenwich, CT. After a night of Halloween parties, Moxley turned up beaten to death outside the home of Michael and Thomas Skakel, cousins to Robert Kennedy. For almost 25 years, the murder went unsolved. Rumors circulated that it was one of the two boys, who both professed a romantic interest in the popular girl. When a broken golf club used to kill Moxley was linked to the Skakel family, the case was still uninvestigated. A&E asks why such a strong lead went ignored for so long and wonders if money can buy innocence(n)

programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: A Murder in Greenwich: The Martha Moxley Case
programme.desc: A Murder in Greenwich: The Martha Moxley Case. (@A&E) investigates the untouchables in American Justice: Martha Moxley. In the 1970s, as today, the Kennedy name carried a lot of clout. Its clan members were a hounded and romanticized group. But when trouble strikes too close to home, someone must be held accountable. Martha Moxley was an energetic teenager who resided in the prestigious neighborhood of Belle Haven in Greenwich, CT. After a night of Halloween parties, Moxley turned up beaten to death outside the home of Michael and Thomas Skakel, cousins to Robert Kennedy. For almost 25 years, the murder went unsolved. Rumors circulated that it was one of the two boys, who both professed a romantic interest in the popular girl. When a broken golf club used to kill Moxley was linked to the Skakel family, the case was still uninvestigated. A&E asks why such a strong lead went ignored for so long and wonders if money can buy innocence(n)

programme.title: Bring It On: Fight to the Finish
programme.desc: An East Los Angeles high school cheer squad captain finds her hopes of winning the upcoming Spirit Championships dashed when her mother remarries and their family relocates to Malibu, where the current cheer squad isn't quite up to snuff. With their fiery fusion of Latin and hip-hop moves, Lina Cruz (Christina Milian) and her best friends Gloria (Vanessa Born) and Treyvonetta (Gabrielle Dennis) are about to lead the East L.A. high school cheer squad to victory at one of the most prominent competitions in the nation. But just as the crew is about to take the world by storm, Lina's mother remarries and the family makes the move to Florida. Once there, Lina quickly realizes that the Malibu Vista High Sea Lions aren't anywhere near as talented as her old cheer squad. Now, in order to transform the Sea Lions into a championship team, Lina must teach them the moves needed to knock the award-winning Jaguar cheer squad and their trash-talking captain Avery (Rachele Brooke Smith) out of the top spot. When Lina and Avery's brother Evan (Cody Longo) becomes romantically involved, the competition between the two girls really begins to heat up. With the stakes higher than ever before, Lina hatches a scheme to take her team all the way to the top and prove that they have what it takes to become true champions(n)

programme.desc: Robin and Barney's seating plan at their wedding is thrown into disarray when old friend Gary Blauman (Taran Killam) shows up unexpectedly. His arrival sparks a debate about where he should sit, and the pals' true opinions of him are revealed as they decide whether he should be allowed to stay. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin and Barney panic half an hour before the wedding, with the bride-to-be convinced it is a bad omen that she never found the locket. Ted attempts to calm her down, and debates whether he should tell the truth about the necklace's location. Lily and Marshall help Barney with his vows, and discover they may not have stuck to their own. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess drowns her sorrows after splitting up with Russell, and finds herself spending the night with ex-boyfriend Paul (guest star Justin Long). Nick is also in danger of falling back into a former relationship, while Cece takes Schmidt to visit her grandmother (Madhur Jaffrey) in a nursing home.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick packs up his possessions in preparation for moving in with Caroline. However, he has a panic attack while taking the removal van to his new flat and carries on driving until he reaches the desert, forcing Jess and Cece to come to the rescue. Winston joins them on the trip, and faces his fear of the dark.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: While Randy tries to fix his relationship with Max, she and Caroline look for larger space for their dessert bar, so Han sets them up a real estate agent who has a crush on him.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.sub-title: And the Attack of the Killer Apartment.
programme.desc: In the hope of getting to know Max better, Randy asks to spend the night at her apartment, while Caroline works on getting a liquor licence for their dessert bar.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard's purchase of a dining-room table causes Sheldon to re-evaluate his life. Meanwhile, Howard is offered the chance to go back to the International Space Station, and Bernadette struggles to decide whether to encourage him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Melissa Rauch.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After arguing with Sheldon, Howard tries to make amends by taking him to Nasa's headquarters in Houston. Elsewhere, Penny has second thoughts about quitting her job as a waitress when her car dies, while Amy tries to find Raj a date. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tom and Alfie cover for Darren, while Armstrong acts as Cindy's protector, and Holly gets a shock when she receives a letter from Jude inviting her and Nick to Ibiza. Holly confides in Ellie and invites her to take Nick's place.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam and the other Adam Goldberg decide to face off in a karate match to settle their long-running feud, so Barry and Adam ask Uncle Marvin for some martial arts training.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes an important decision after Leonard tries to help her in the aftermath of a failed role on a TV show. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart practise talking to strangers at a shopping centre, and Sheldon studies to become a comic genius. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a holiday, and when Penny quits her job the duo end up spending time together. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of his girlfriend's career decision, Bernadette seeks Stuart's help in replacing one of Howard's comic books, and Howard and Raj provide Amy with some advice. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a parrot that thinks it is the pop star Sia, a man who saves the life of a kookaburra with a tyre pump and a chimpanzee that has a go at virtual reality.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Irreverent panel show hosted by Jimmy Carr, in which guests join team captains Rob Beckett and Aisling Bea to answer questions based on opinion polls. Aisling is joined by Ant Middleton and Katherine Ryan, while Rob teams up with comedy actress Kerry Howard and new comic Ola.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard worries his lack of American football knowledge is alienating him from Penny and her friends. However, he finds an unlikely sporting tutor in the form of Sheldon, who reluctantly spent most of his childhood attending games with his father. Meanwhile, Raj is infuriated when Howard abandons him to pursue a girl at a kite-fighting contest.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A jealous Leonard argues with Penny when she invites one of her male friends to stay at her apartment while he is in town. Unfortunately, the row brings up unpleasant memories for Sheldon of watching his warring parents, causing even more tension between the friends. Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The nation's favourite armchair critics share their opinions on programmes including Guy Martin's Wall of Death: Live, Bake Off Creme de la Creme, EastEnders, Bear Grylls: Mission Survive, Antiques Roadshow, This Farming Life, The Night Manager and the news. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively - sometimes emotional - discussions from the comfort of their own homes.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a parrot that thinks it is the pop star Sia, a man who saves the life of a kookaburra with a tyre pump and a chimpanzee that has a go at virtual reality.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Irreverent panel show hosted by Jimmy Carr, in which guests join team captains Rob Beckett and Aisling Bea to answer questions based on opinion polls. Aisling is joined by Ant Middleton and Katherine Ryan, while Rob teams up with comedy actress Kerry Howard and new comic Ola.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: The studio's patrons include Vicky, who survived a terrible rollercoaster accident and hopes to celebrate her family with an animal tribute tattoo. Alice covers a likeness of a cringeworthy celebrity crush for Abby, who has now gone off her unlikely dream man, while Jordan wants to camouflage the tattoo he got to win an argument, and calls on Jay to create an RAF tribute to his grandfather.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Twenty-five-year-old businessman Justin has never had a girlfriend and has turned to self-help manuals to improve his understanding of women so model booker Maisie is in for a big surprise when he uses what he has learnt from the books. After her first date at the restaurant didn't work out, Teresa, 66, hopes to find someone who shares her passion for partying, so she might have found her ideal match when 79-year-old Lee arrives with a hangover.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: New Yorker Ted Mosby begins to fear he will never find love, and decides to embark on a quest to find a woman he can share his life with. He thinks he may have discovered her when he strikes up a rapport with TV reporter Robin Scherbatsky in a bar - but his overenthusiasm proves to be a serious stumbling block. Pilot episode of the sitcom, starring Josh Radnor, Alyson Hannigan, Jason Segel, Neil Patrick Harris and Cobie Smulders.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: A nervous Danny is offered a cameo role on a popular daytime TV show - and when he charms one of the leading actresses, she decides to make him her new love interest. Tucker and Ben come up with an inventive way to get Bonnie out of their flat and back into her own.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Bonnie gets depressed about all the losers she has been dating, so Ben and Danny compete to see who can pair her up with the perfect guy. Determined to beat his big brother at something, Ben arranges for Bonnie to date one of his customers, while Danny sets her up with Ben's boss. Meanwhile, Riley and Tucker find themselves involved in their neighbour Sondra's marital problems. Starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darren and Nancy go to visit Kyle, but Nancy is worried about his welfare, while Tom and Alfie get the wrong end of the stick at The Loft and Courtney makes a big decision.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: In Malaga, bad behaviour on the golf course leaves Brendan red-faced, and there are some truly remarkable results when the tourists paint images of one another at a Picasso art class. It is the last chance for a red card at the vote, so the competitors will each be hoping to make it through to the final day.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Alex's girlfriend Nicola flies in from Ireland to find out what happened when he went missing in Ibiza, while Spencer reacquaints himself with old friend Tallulah.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Though still heartbroken over Sophia, Jake's spirits are lifted when the squad is invited to a Homeland Security counter-terrorism training simulation. Gina performs a psychological test on Holt, while Santiago and Diaz compete for a day off.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When Peralta notices Holt is in a bad mood, he teams up with the captain's husband Kevin to find out what has gone wrong. Boyle tries to get a confession out of an elderly bank-robbery suspect (played by Happy Days creator Garry Marshall), who pretends to be frail and adorable whenever Santiago and Diaz are around.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.sub-title: What Happens in Jersey - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Joe's dying grandmother begs him to come and visit one last time on her birthday, and to bring his wife Tiffany along. He had failed to tell his family about the divorce, so Mel is forced to take a road trip to New Jersey and pose as his ex-wife at the party. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.sub-title: What Happens in Jersey - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Joe's dying grandmother begs him to visit one last time on her birthday, and to bring his wife Tiffany along. He had failed to tell his family about the divorce, so Mel is forced to take a road trip to New Jersey to pose as his ex-wife at the party. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Tucker's latest failed relationship prompts him to focus on the one that got away - his college girlfriend Olivia. In an effort to cheer their friend up, Ben and Danny track Olivia down in the hope of reuniting the lovebirds, but when Tucker meets Olivia he gets a big surprise. Elsewhere, ambitious Riley gets into trouble when she overuses her corporate credit card to network and pull in new clients.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: An Officer and a Gentle Ben.
programme.desc: Fleet Week sees Bonnie meet up with handsome Captain Hudson, with whom she has a yearly fling, but she gets into a panic when he proposes to her. Ben and Riley make an effort to define their relationship but keep getting their wires crossed. Riley's colleague Robyn takes a fancy to Danny and asks Riley to set them up on a date.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: A visitor at the hotel intentionally stirs up trouble between Lily and Robin, and also between Ted and Barney. Meanwhile, Marshall and baby Marvin finally arrive at the Farhampton Inn to join the wedding party. American sitcom, guest starring Andrew Rannells.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall tells the gang about his quest to learn the three mighty virtues of speed, strength and accuracy to master the Slap of a Million Exploding Suns - before delivering a devastating blow to Barney. American sitcom, guest starring Boyz II Men.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Julia tells Nick she does not want to put a label on their relationship, leaving him anxious and disappointed, and she also annoys Jess by refusing to help her get out of paying for a parking ticket. Winston tries to impress a former date, while Schmidt is determined to find out why his towel is always damp. Comedy, starring Lizzy Caplan, Jake Johnson and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess decides to mark her first Valentine's Day as a single woman by going on a meaningless date with a stranger and asks Schmidt to help her find a suitable candidate. Nick's romantic plans are ruined when Julia is overwhelmed with work, while Winston gets a second chance to impress Shelby. Guest starring Ryan Kwanten (True Blood) and Clark Duke (Hot Tub Time Machine).(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The division incurs another personnel change that threatens to put Jake and Amy's budding relationship at risk. Meanwhile, Terry assists Holt with an important public relations matter and Rosa and Gina try to convince Charles to rethink his affection for a fellow officer. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake thinks Boyle might have met his soulmate in Genevieve, an art gallery owner, and tries to set the pair up on a date. Meanwhile, Rosa deals with an intra-precinct theft and Amy seeks Holt's help with an image campaign. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard becomes concerned that Sheldon will overreact when his friend learns the truth about a past indiscretion, while Penny confronts Raj's old flame Lucy about the way she ended their relationship. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is dismayed when the group spends the Thanksgiving holiday at Mrs Wolowitz's house, but hits it off with Bernadette's father. Meanwhile, Penny realises she must deal with a mistake from her past when she and Leonard have an argument. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part one of two. Ted says his goodbyes to the gang after Barney and Robin's wedding day, and prepares for his new life in Chicago. However, he has a fateful encounter with someone at Farhampton railway station. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part two of two. In the last-ever episode of the comedy, the friends reunite for Ted's wedding, having seen less of one another recently due to their changing circumstances. Meanwhile, a monumental event in Barney's personal life leads him to change his ways. Starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess is lacking direction after being fired from her teaching job and agrees to act as a `shot girl' at a party thrown by Schmidt. Winston shows a new side to his personality after enjoying some of Nick's elaborate cocktails and Cece introduces the gang to her new boyfriend. Comedy, with Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess encounters a handsome stranger who is waiting to meet a woman he befriended on the internet, so she decides to pretend to be his date. Nick becomes convinced that an old man at the bar is a version of himself who has travelled back in time, while Schmidt tries to woo Winston's sister. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.sub-title: And the Partnership Hits the Fan.
programme.desc: A law firm courting Randy for a job invites him and Max to dinner at a trendy new restaurant, but their cuisine does not sit well with the outspoken waitress.(n)

programme.desc: Max and Caroline try to persuade the owner of the pizza restaurant next door to Han's diner to rent her back office to them, so they can expand their dessert bar premises. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon receives a nasty surprise when he visits his mother in Houston, while Raj's murder mystery party causes conflict for the rest of the gang members. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is racked with guilt when he tries to date Lucy and Emily at the same time, Penny has trouble deciding whether to take a role in a film, and Sheldon struggles to choose between two gaming systems. Comedy, starring Kunal Nayyar, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry's membership of a friendship group is jeopardised and a family swear jar is introduced. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: SportsNation
programme.desc: ESPN Radio personality Colin Cowherd and Michelle Beadle host this sports talk show that's powered by the fans. The topics covered in this weekday show are chosen by fans voting on ESPN.com's SportsNation site(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: Documentary looking at several underwater species that damage the environments they inhabit, including lionfish, jellyfish, algae and the Nile perch, commonly found in Africa.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor braves the icy Alaskan wilderness to fulfil his lifelong dream of catching a giant salmon. He also learns how to fish on a frozen lake using a nine-pronged spear, before travelling to Seward Harbour on the southern coast of the state to search for cod. Finally, he celebrates Thanksgiving with the residents of Nanwalek, a tribal village of just 300 people.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: How the growth of phytoplankton along the coastal waters of Alaska and British Columbia attracts a vast array of marine life to feast on billions of herring. Footage includes humpback whales migrating from Hawaii as well as Steller sea lions, dolphins and killer whales that make the long and arduous journey toward the abundant fish, risking malnutrition and attacks from predators along the way. Narrated by David Attenborough. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Wild Caribbean
programme.desc: The varied landscape of the tropical islands and the species that inhabit them, from flamingos and four-eyed fish to anteaters and cave-dwelling rodents. The programme also delves deeper to explore the islands' destructive history of volcanic eruptions, dangerous reefs and powerful hurricanes.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Animal Mind
programme.desc: Combining remarkable demonstrations of abilities with revealing photography, Chris Packham travels the world to uncover the secrets of animals' intelligence, emotions and self-awareness. The first episode explores the remarkable ways creatures use their senses, examining how dogs' powerful ability to detect smell creates a bizarre alternative reality for them.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at creatures that can fly, focusing on falcons, pelicans, kestrels, owls, parrots, vultures and eagles.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the invasive species and pests that threaten forests, including the Asian long-horned beetle and the emerald ash borer, which have wiped out billions of trees in the USA. Across the border into Canada, the mountain pine beetle has halved the number of lodgepole pines, and the kissing bug, a carrier for Chagas disease, ticks and the Burmese python are also damaging woodland.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: On New Zealand's North Island, the actor joins record-breaking fisherman Geoff Stone to hunt for hapuka. He then celebrates his birthday with Maori people, enjoying a feast of mussels caught on the Waitangi River. Finally, Robson travels to Motiti Island's Bay of Plenty, where he takes part in a nerve-racking free-dive to snatch crayfish from waters teeming with jellyfish.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.sub-title: To the Ends of the Earth.
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the Arctic and Antarctic to explore the wildernesses at Earth's poles, investigating the wildlife and geographical features found there. He begins by travelling to the North Pole, where two polar bears reveal a surprisingly tender side to their characters, before heading to the South Pole - 100 years after Roald Amundsen and Robert Falcon Scott first reached it.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Wild Caribbean
programme.desc: The coral and shipwrecks found off the shores of the tropical islands, and how the different kinds of reef have given rise to a huge diversity of underwater life in the area. Underwater time-lapse photography also shows how carnivorous corals feed at night and how, over a few nights of the year, they disperse their sperm and eggs.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: Solo pursues the lone male who attacked Poppy and his daughter Sri through the forest.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: Loggers move into the forest and Apollo watches them felling a tree. He returns to the comfort of home, where baby Tiga is in a playful mood.(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: High school senior Eric Stoltz foolishly ignores the charms of Mary Stuart Masterson as he pursues unattainable beauty Lea Thompson in John Hughes' rights-of-passage teenage movie that charts the highs and lows of the agonies of dating, growing up and being an individual rather than part of the group(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars in this coming of age comedy as one of three teenage girls facing tough decisions on life and love while working in a pizza parlour(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. When La Fleur learns that he must pay the bank $50,000 in 30 days, Goodman is overjoyed: he can acquire his rival's building, knock it down and have the car park his gym's always needed. But La Fleur decides to set up a money-earning dodgeball tournament (a sport that consists of not being hit by balls hurled by the opposing team). And, of course, La Fleur's team of misfits end up in a face-off against Goodman's tough pros in the final. Rawson Marshall Thurber's debut feature is a mix of verbal and physical humour, and, if the outcome is never in doubt, both Vaughn and Stiller throw themselves into the venture with enjoyable gusto(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Freddy Rodriguez, John Leguizamo, Debra Messing, Alfred Molina, and Elizabeth Peña star in Washington Heights director Alfredo de Villa's earnest family drama about the importance of familial relationships in times of personal crisis. The snow is falling and Christmas has come to Chicago. For the Rodriguez family, there is particular cause to celebrate this year; youngest sibling Jesse (Rodriguez) has recently returned home safe and sound after fighting in the war overseas. But as the members of the Rodriguez family converge on their parent's home, there's a strange sense of tension lingering heavy in the cool winter air. Despite the fact that Jesse is doing his best to get back in the good graces of his old flame, she seems reluctant to forgive him for leaving in the first place. Meanwhile, his older sister, Roxanna, has little to show for time spent chasing her Hollywood dreams, and eldest brother Mauricio (Leguizamo) is married to a high-strung executive who seems more interested in advancing her career than starting a family. But while none of this sits too well with concerned mother Anna (Peña), the bombshell she's about to drop could prove the straw that broke this family's back. When Anna announces to her children that she is planning to divorce their father, Eduardo (Molina), Roxanna, Jesse, and Mauricio instinctively pull together and begin to reevaluate their past while looking at the future in a whole new light. Later, as lingering resentments are let go and weakened bonds are reaffirmed, the Rodriquez family begins to experience the healing power of laughter while discovering that together as a family they are far stronger than they ever could be apart(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier (Luke Wilson) who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment. Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard. Directed by Mike Judge, who co-wrote the script with Etan Cohen(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: High school senior Eric Stoltz foolishly ignores the charms of Mary Stuart Masterson as he pursues unattainable beauty Lea Thompson in John Hughes' rights-of-passage teenage movie that charts the highs and lows of the agonies of dating, growing up and being an individual rather than part of the group(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Michael Shaara, For Love of the Game brought Kevin Costner back to the world of baseball after his successes with Bull Durham (1988) and Field of Dreams (1989). Billy Chapel (Kevin Costner) is a star pitcher with the Detroit Tigers, standing on the mound at Yankee Stadium and throwing what is shaping up to be a perfect game with the help of his best friend and catcher, Gus Osinski (John C. Reilly). However, Billy is having a hard time keeping his mind on the game; he's come to a crossroads in both his personal and professional lives, and he isn't sure what to do or where to go. He's learned that the Tigers are about to be sold, and the new owners intend to trade him at the end of the season, and that his girlfriend Jane (Kelly Preston) is planning to leave him. For Love of the Game represents a change of pace for director Sam Raimi, best-known for the Evil Dead trilogy and the acclaimed suspense drama A Simple Plan (1998) (although Raimi, a baseball fan born in Michigan, doubtless enjoyed making a film featuring the Detroit Tigers)(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Adventure drama about the confrontation between two Europeans and a pair of lions that are obstructing the progress of a railway line in East Africa during the 1890s. When the labourers become so frightened by recurring lion attacks at their campsite that they are reluctant to continue to work, an engineer and a big-game hunter join forces in an attempt to outwit the predators(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: After years of inactivity, Camp Crystal Lake opens for the summer season. It has been shut down lo these many years because of a gruesome, unsolved murder on the premises. The current Camp Crystal Lake clientele consists almost exclusively of promiscuous teenagers, who seal their own death warrants by making love in the outdoors, frolicking in the nude, wandering off alone, etc. Friday the 13th was seen by so many people that a synopsis is almost superfluous. Suffice to say, this is the film that shattered actress Betsy Palmer's peaches-and-cream image for good and all. Incidentally, Palmer was cast in the film primarily because she was willing to drive her own car to location! Friday the 13th was, of course, followed by innumerable sequels, released on an annual basis(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: A killer terrorises a group of camp counsellors(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Terry Gilliam's film stars Johnny Depp as Raoul Duke (a thinly disguised Thompson) and Benicio Del Toro as his companion Dr. Gonzo en route to Las Vegas to report on a convention of district attorneys, fuelled only by a collection of almost every illegal drug going and enough booze to float a battleship(n)

programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: Road comedy about parents taking their spunky 7-year-old daughter and dysfunctional family from New Mexico to California for a kiddie beauty pageant(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Adventure drama about the confrontation between two Europeans and a pair of lions that are obstructing the progress of a railway line in East Africa during the 1890s. When the labourers become so frightened by recurring lion attacks at their campsite that they are reluctant to continue to work, an engineer and a big-game hunter join forces in an attempt to outwit the predators(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier (Luke Wilson) who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment. Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard. Directed by Mike Judge, who co-wrote the script with Etan Cohen(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: Chandler Chan Jarrell, is a man who tracks down lost children for a living. When the beautiful Kee Nang, a Tibetan priestess, approaches him with the flattering yet disarming declaration that he is the chosen one, his quest for the illustrious golden child begins(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Training Day director Antoine Fuqua takes viewers on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation, loyalty, and duty while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie Dugan (Richard Gere) is days away from retirement, but he's been burnt-out for years. Unable to remember why he signed up for the job in the first place, all Eddie can think about is retreating to his fishing cabin in Connecticut, and forgetting the horrors that he's seen during his decades on the job. At the same time, undercover narcotics cop Clarence "Tango" Butler (Don Cheadle) is right in the thick of it. As hard as he tries to quit, however, his superiors always find a way of keeping him on the job. Much like Dugan, he's lost sight of his priorities, and these days Tango's loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. And Tango isn't the only cop who's being drawn to the dark side of the law; narcotics officer Sal Procida's (Ethan Hawke) wife is currently pregnant with twins, and he's barely making enough to keep his family afloat. When Sal learns that his wife is at risk of losing their unborn children, desperation drives him to consider unethical means of ensuring financial stability. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene as the NYPD attempts to clean up the BK projects, the epicenter of lawlessness in the highest-crime precinct(n)

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: Road comedy about parents taking their spunky 7-year-old daughter and dysfunctional family from New Mexico to California for a kiddie beauty pageant(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: After years of inactivity, Camp Crystal Lake opens for the summer season. It has been shut down lo these many years because of a gruesome, unsolved murder on the premises. The current Camp Crystal Lake clientele consists almost exclusively of promiscuous teenagers, who seal their own death warrants by making love in the outdoors, frolicking in the nude, wandering off alone, etc. Friday the 13th was seen by so many people that a synopsis is almost superfluous. Suffice to say, this is the film that shattered actress Betsy Palmer's peaches-and-cream image for good and all. Incidentally, Palmer was cast in the film primarily because she was willing to drive her own car to location! Friday the 13th was, of course, followed by innumerable sequels, released on an annual basis(n)

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Comic genius Steve Martin delivers an incredible performance as an engaging small town fire chief who has only one tiny flaw - no, make that one huge flaw - his astonishingly long nose. Although he considers it to be no laughing matter, the hilarity never stops as C.D. Bales contends with nose jokes, a bumbling crew of firemen, and his secret love for gorgeous astronomy student Roxanne. Unfortunately, she's attracted to fireman Chris, who's tall on looks and short on conversation. And when C.D. agrees to coach the dumbstruck Chris in his pursuit of the fair maiden, this ticklish triangle dissolves into a hilarious series of rib-tickling romantic misadventures. A contemporary love story of mistaken identity and unrequited love(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: In fifties Connecticut, Frank and April Wheeler struggle to hold on to their dreams when boredom and resentment engulf their seemingly perfect marriage. Drama(n)

programme.desc: The film revolves around Dante Hicks and Randal Graves who are still working at the same Quick Stop video and convenience store in New Jersey. But when it burns down, they take up jobs at a nearby fast-food joint managed by Becky(n)

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman empire(n)

programme.desc: A Cup a Joe. A restaurateur wants a mum-and-pop diner, knowing its value will skyrocket with the new freeway off-ramp he's arranged(n)

programme.title: Game of Death
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller, starring Bruce Lee in a role which was completed by a double following his death. A famous kung fu movie actor fakes his own demise as part of a ploy to get back at his ruthless enemies(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.title: Monk

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The FBI's investigation into the death of Van Pelt's fiance comes to an end, just in time for her to help investigate the murder of a mob boss's son, who was killed while celebrating the prospect of taking control of the business from his ailing father. While Jane and the others focus their inquiries on the rest of the crime family, Grace takes the only witness in for interrogation, but is distracted by her own problems, and forced into a game of cat-and-mouse against a determined assassin. Drama, starring Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and Lisbon investigate the murder of an out-of-favour fashion designer who was planning to revitalise his career by launching a new clothing line, but first have to track down the man employed to make the outfits. Darcy continues to re-examine the Panzer case, talking to a blind woman who was friends with Red John - only for her to reveal the serial killer is still alive. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman looks set to be convicted of murdering her dance teacher, but Jane believes she is innocent after watching her give a press conference. He tries to prove she is not the killer before the jury's verdict is read out in court - so he announces that footage has been found of the crime taking place and waits to see who takes the bait. Crime drama, guest starring Ian Kahn, Diane Farr and James Frain, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman convicted of murdering her husband is given permission to leave jail for a few days to help Jane track down a former charity worker's killer, and they learn the philanthropist the victim once worked for is not as benevolent as he seems. However, as the case progresses, the consultant's new partner uses her charms to try to fool him and make a bid for her freedom. Crime drama, guest starring Morena Baccarin (Homeland), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murders of three college students, apparently caught in the middle of a gang shootout. It transpires that one of the youngsters was the son of people known to Taylor. The detective also tries to keep her relationship with Fritz under wraps while her mother remains in town. Detective drama, with Kyra Sedgwick, Robert Gossett and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda's 40th birthday approaches, she investigates the high-profile case of a woman who was murdered at one of Los Angeles' trendiest restaurants. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in Provenza's garage, forcing Brenda to become involved in a cover-up of her own. The detective struggles to protect members of her team, who find themselves racing against the clock before the LAPD finds out what they are up to. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a paparazzo, who appears to have killed himself by jumping out of a hotel window. They discover a popular celebrity may have been the target of the photographer's prying camera. Meanwhile, calls from a female colleague to Fritz stir up feelings of jealousy in Brenda. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo confronts a man impersonating a Navy officer, which results in guns being drawn, and the only eyewitness to the case is the Special Agent's father - who is in town to disclose a secret to his son. The 250th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb detonates at a military charity concert, killing two men. Called to investigate, Tony and McGee try to determine whether the intended target was the 1980s rocker headlining the act or if the attack was part of a larger scheme against the military. Meanwhile, Jimmy prepares for parenthood. Keith Carradine guest stars, with Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. DiNozzo, McGee and the FBI continue to track political connections to a case, and Bishop sends DiNozzo a souvenir. Meanwhile, Gibbs and Special Agent Pride chase leads in New Orleans after evidence points to a copycat killer. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Fr Donovan organises a Christmas play at the shopping centre, and casts Stan as Santa Claus and Roger as Jesus - but they land themselves in trouble after getting into a fight with each other. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff adopt a child, who turns out to be possessed.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve tries to prove his toughness to Stan by adopting the persona of a superhero, while Francine also goes through an identity crisis when she receives news that could change the family for ever.(n)

programme.title: Shots Fired
programme.desc: Tensions are on the rise at Gate Station, as a violent riot erupts, bringing the citizens and the police into conflict. Crime drama, starring Sanaa Lathan and Stephan James.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Kiss Seen Around the World.
programme.desc: Meg lands a job at the local TV station, only to suffer the humiliation of having her first kiss broadcast to hordes of viewers. Meanwhile, Stewie plots an appropriate revenge on the miscreant who stole his tricycle.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter loses his job and decides to pursue his lifelong dream of becoming a knight at a travelling Renaissance fair. Unfortunately, he finds himself locked in a tournament with the resident jousting champion. With the guest voice of Will Ferrell.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Hayley splits up with her boyfriend Jeff and ends up falling for Stan's CIA body double, who in turn starts flirting with Francine. Meanwhile, Steve rescues chickens from a slurry factory. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Scott Grimes.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger suggests Stan hold a telethon to replace money lost in CIA budget cuts, but the spy takes all the credit for the idea, prompting his alien lodger to sabotage the event.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: One If by Clam, Two If by Sea.
programme.desc: A hurricane sweeps through Quahog and damages the Drunken Clam - which is then bought at a knock-down price by an opportunistic expat Brit who angers the locals by turning it into an English-themed pub. Meanwhile, Stewie tries to teach the new landlord's three-year-old daughter how to speak proper English.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg tries to get friendly with the in-crowd at school, but becomes the target of their cruel mockery. Peter competes against Chris in a variety of winter pursuits, including a skating race and the unusual `kitchenware on face and head' contest - but there is a surprise in store for him.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger believes his identity has been stolen when his credit card unexpectedly reaches its limit, and sets out to catch the criminal. However, after a few days of playing detective, he realises things are not quite what they seem. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Wendy Schaal.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan gets a new position as his boss's adviser and is delighted to accommodate his every request. However, the job begins to threaten his personal life and Francine is roped in to help complete an outrageous task, ruining her plans to spend Valentine's Day with her husband.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is struck by lightning and hovers on the brink of death. In his state of limbo he experiences flashbacks that make him realise he should pay more attention to his beloved wife. At the same time, he agrees to arrange a date for Death with the girl from the pet shop. Peter Frampton guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois becomes a martial arts expert and puts her new-found skills to use by chasing away tourists watching the leaves fall in Quahog. Unfortunately her zeal for combat soon infects the entire Griffin household, leading to an all-out family brawl.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan becomes jealous when he discovers Francine was once engaged to a pilot whose plane crashed. However, it emerges his wife's would-be husband survived the incident, and the envious spy enlists Roger's help to track him down.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve dons a mask and takes revenge on the popular girls at his school for humiliating his girlfriend Debbie. When his identity is exposed, he is forced to flee from an angry mob along with his friends. With the guest voice of Lizzy Caplan.(n)

Detective drama, guest starring Larry Miller (10 Things I Hate About You) and featuring cameo appearances by members of the rock band Korn.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A man who wanted to expose the killer of the Visualise cult co-founder is murdered, leading the team to investigate old adversary Bret Stiles, who was photographed wearing a bloodied suit. As the sect's inner circle meets to elect a new leader, Jane hopes spreading a rumour will help him catch the culprit - but when nobody takes the bait, he has to change his tactics. Crime drama, guest starring Malcolm McDowell, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team examine the murder of a Shakespeare enthusiast and become suspicious of the victim's billionaire employer when he announces a $10million reward for information about the case, despite having a reputation for frugality. Meanwhile, FBI agent Susan Darcy enlists Jane's help to investigate the killing of a woman whose body was found in woods, and their only clue is a piece of glass from a wine bottle. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in Provenza's garage, forcing Brenda to become involved in a cover-up of her own. The detective struggles to protect members of her team, who find themselves racing against the clock before the LAPD finds out what they are up to. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a paparazzo, who appears to have killed himself by jumping out of a hotel window. They discover a popular celebrity may have been the target of the photographer's prying camera. Meanwhile, calls from a female colleague to Fritz stir up feelings of jealousy in Brenda. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The dismembered body parts of an adult-film star are found in a skip, prompting Brenda and the team to look for more clues to solve the puzzle. However, once they begin gathering the evidence, the suspect list gets increasingly longer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team try to solve the case of a mother and daughter whose drowned bodies have been found by fishermen. As events proceed, a surprising revelation helps them unravel the mystery. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. DiNozzo, McGee and the FBI continue to track political connections to a case, and Bishop sends DiNozzo a souvenir. Meanwhile, Gibbs and Special Agent Pride chase leads in New Orleans after evidence points to a copycat killer. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee's girlfriend Delilah makes a breakthrough in a case involving the alleged death of a US navy lieutentant. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team must ascertain whether the murder of a Navy officer, whose body was found on a rural road, was the result of a bar fight or because he knew too much about an attack on a fellow female officer. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine sergeant falls to her death from a building, and when Gibbs and his team examine the circumstances, the woman's doctor urges him to consider this a murder investigation.(n)

Western, starring Gregory Peck, Millard Mitchell, Karl Malden and Helen Westcott.(n)

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: An aristocratic 19th-century swordsman returns to his native California from Spain to find the people living under the rule of a cruel tyrant. He adopts the guise of a masked avenger, fighting to protect the poor and downtrodden, while playing the foppish nobleman in his day-to-day life to avoid suspicion. Swashbuckling adventure, with Tyrone Power and Basil Rathbone.(n)

programme.title: Beau Geste
programme.desc: Three brothers are accused of stealing from their aristocratic adopted mother. They seek to salvage their honour by joining the foreign legion, battling a rampaging Arab army as well as coming into conflict with their sadistic commanding officer. Action adventure, starring Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston and Brian Donlevy.(n)

programme.title: Guns at Batasi
programme.desc: Rebels besiege the headquarters of a British battalion garrisoned in Africa, enraged by the officers' refusal to give up a prisoner. Meanwhile, the sergeant major struggles to maintain order in his increasingly tense surroundings. Drama, starring Richard Attenborough, Jack Hawkins, Flora Robson and Mia Farrow.(n)

programme.title: Baggage Claim
programme.desc: An air hostess is horrified at the thought of her younger sister getting married while she is still single. She realises her job gives her access to eligible men from across America, and begins clocking up thousands of air miles as she scours the country for a potential fiance. Romantic comedy, with Paula Patton and Taye Diggs.(n)

programme.title: War of the Planet of the Apes Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Matt Reeves and star Andy Serkis talk about making the third film in the series.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: In a future ravaged by war, the superhero team makes a desperate last stand against a force of deadly robots. Their only hope is to send Wolverine back in time to the 1970s, to join forces with an earlier version of the X-Men and change the events that started the conflict. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Jennifer Lawrence, James McAvoy and Michael Fassbender.(n)

programme.title: Nymphomaniac: Volume II
programme.desc: A woman continues telling the man who saved her life the unusual story of her sexual history, which now turns to the more recent events of her life and the disturbing incidents that ultimately led to her brush with death. Concluding part of Lars von Trier's drama, starring Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgard and Stacy Martin.(n)

programme.title: Powder Room
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a series of setbacks is reunited with an old friend from college, who is now a successful businesswoman living in Paris. During an evening at a nightclub, she begins spinning a web of lies to make her life seem more impressive - but her efforts are ruined by the arrival of her rowdy mates. Comedy, starring Sheridan Smith, Kate Nash, Jaime Winstone and Oona Chaplin.(n)

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: A prominent Victorian gentleman thinks he has got away with poisoning his wife, but his shrewd maid knows the sordid truth and uses it to blackmail him. As the killer's social standing improves, he realises he has to get rid of the scheming servant once and for all, but his plans to dispose of her lead him into even more danger. Period thriller, with Stewart Granger, Jean Simmons and Bill Travers.(n)

programme.title: The Charge of the Light Brigade
programme.desc: Historical drama set during the Crimean War, in which British military commanders order a disastrous attack on Russian gun positions, causing the needless slaughter of hundreds of cavalrymen. Starring David Hemmings, Vanessa Redgrave, John Gielgud, Trevor Howard and Harry Andrews.(n)

programme.title: Tomahawk
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jim Bridger doesn't approve when a gold rush leads the US army to build a fort on land occupied by the Sioux. The situation goes from bad to worse when a sadistic officer launches an unprovoked attack, prompting a vengeful tribe to go on the offensive and leaving Bridger the only one who can save the soldiers at the fort from certain death. Western, starring Van Heflin, Yvonne de Carlo and Alex Nicol, and featuring an early appearance by Rock Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Spying
programme.desc: A secret formula is stolen by a sinister organisation masterminded by the evil Dr Crow. The British government plans to assign its top agents to deal with the crisis, but owing to staff shortages, has to settle for a bungling spy and his three hapless trainees. Comedy, starring Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Barbara Windsor, Bernard Cribbins, Jim Dale, Eric Barker and Victor Maddern.(n)

programme.title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: A girl grows up in 16th-century Europe under the iron fist of her stepmother, until the love of handsome Prince Henry offers a glimmer of hope. Unfortunately, the royal gent has worries of his own in the shape of an arranged marriage. Luckily, Renaissance genius Leonardo da Vinci is on hand to play fairy godfather and bring the pair together. Romantic drama, starring Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott and Timothy West.(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A scientist carries out genetic experiments on apes, hoping to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease. A chimpanzee used in the tests develops superior intelligence and becomes outraged at the human race's cruel treatment of his kind, forming his fellow primates into an army to overthrow mankind. Sci-fi thriller, starring James Franco, Freida Pinto and Andy Serkis.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Drummond needs Piglet's help to prevent MI6 being merged with MI5.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: A couple's ordinary life is transformed by the intervention of MI5.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Fed up with doing everything himself, Martin hands in his resignation as chairman of the Residents' Association - and to his surprise, it is accepted. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Penelope Wilton and Peter Egan.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Brittas takes charge of preparations for the official opening of Whitbury Leisure Center, with a royal visitor due to attend. Sadly, the builders dislike him so much they don't bother to tell him that the brand new pool is leaking. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Smiler reminisces about a woman who escaped his advances during the war without leaving her contact details, so Truly, Alvin and Billy volunteer to track her down - even though it means a foray into hostile territory. Long-running comedy series, starring Frank Thornton, Brian Murphy, Keith Clifford and Stephen Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Afterthoughts of a Co-op Manager.
programme.desc: Truly discovers a former suitor of Marina's went off to Australia, and convinces her the emigrant did so to forget about her - and that she should stop seeing Howard out of respect to the other man's memory. Long-running comedy series, starring Frank Thornton, Jean Fergusson and Robert Fyfe.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Auntie Wainwright is thrilled to have picked up a bargain at the auction rooms, but puzzled as to what the object is. Worse yet, when she does find out what her purchase is meant for, she still has no idea what to do with it. Long-running comedy series, starring Jean Alexander, Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Fed up with doing everything himself, Martin hands in his resignation as chairman of the Residents' Association - and to his surprise, it is accepted. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Penelope Wilton and Peter Egan.(n)

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Brittas takes charge of preparations for the official opening of Whitbury Leisure Center, with a royal visitor due to attend. Sadly, the builders dislike him so much they don't bother to tell him that the brand new pool is leaking. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Betting fever sweeps Slade Prison, but the stakes rise too high for some of the inmates, stretching honour among thieves to the limit. Vintage comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Richard Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville tries to persuade Arkwright to buy a van, so he does not have to struggle with the shop's outdated delivery bike. He is pleasantly surprised when his skinflint uncle agrees - until he takes the vehicle out on the road. Comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: A violent storm destroys St Barnabas's stained glass window, and Geraldine is put in charge of raising funds to replace it - but the others are unsure whether any of her outlandish ideas will actually work. Comedy, starring Dawn French, Gary Waldhorn, James Fleet, Emma Chambers and Liz Smith.(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Penny-pinching Basil goes behind Sybil's back to save money on structural alterations to the hotel and hires an incompetent cowboy builder to do the job - an underhand tactic that ends up costing him dearly. Classic comedy, starring John Cleese and Prunella Scales.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
