programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: A British fighter pilot trains to be an astronaut during the Cold War, but his space vessel malfunctions and he fights hypoxia as he gets mixed signals from the UK, the US and Soviet Russia on the ground(n)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: Comedy-drama about a retired thief's pursuit of a young pretender who is aping his style. Set on the French Riviera, the film includes a host of typically Hitchcockian flourishes(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Paul Hogan reprises his role as the laid-back crocodile hunter. This time out, he and his reporter girlfriend investigate an international scandal(n)

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: The life story of a strong-willed young woman who has a magical effect on a depressed present-day housewife. As unfolded in extended flashbacks, the girl saves a friend from a brutal husband and is suspected of his murder. But this dramatic thread is only part of the story tracing her from childhood and the loss of a beloved brother to her proprietorship of an Alabama cafe, her stubborn stand against racism - and what happened at her trial(n)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two geeks create a computerised dream girl in this teen fantasy-comedy(n)

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: A disillusioned artist plans on leaving New York City, but first wants to walk across Manhattan with his friends. However, the trip doesn't go as planned when he spots his ex-girlfriend and his friends plot to keep him from moving(n)

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: A businessman (Chris Pine) discovers a ruinous family secret during a return trip home to attend the funeral of his estranged father. In the wake of this life-altering revelation, he embarks on a transformative journey that will forever alter the way he looks at life, love, and family. Star Trek screenwriter Alex Kurtzman makes his feature directorial debut with this heartfelt drama co-written by Roberto Orci and Jody Lambert, and featuring Elizabeth Banks(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Four teens living in inner-city Cleveland (Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Moisés Arias, Rafi Gavron, and Ezri Walker) steal cars to support their dream of becoming pro skateboarders, and discover a large stash of pills during one heist. When they decide to sell the drugs themselves, they are targeted by an organic-food proprietor who's secretly a local crime boss (Linda Emond). Michael Kenneth Williams and Erykah Badu co-star. Steven Caple Jr. wrote and directed this crime drama, which made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: Comedian Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between(n)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two geeks create a computerised dream girl in this teen fantasy-comedy(n)

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: Offering a dead-on look at high-school life in the mid '70s that is refreshing for its lack of teen-movie stereotypes, Dazed and Confused is set in a middle-class Texas town on the last day of high school and chronicles the actions of the various teens as they prepare for the figurative changing of the guard when seniors leave, juniors prepare to be seniors and freshman struggle to avoid the annual hazing. The historically accurate soundtrack is a definite highlight(n)

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: Comedian Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between(n)

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: A 19-year-old woman contracts a sexually transmitted curse after a one-night stand with a handsome stranger. Terrorized by malevolent phantoms, she turns to her friends to find a way out of this nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: Roger Donaldson's bank heist/ conspiracy thriller hybrid - scripted by Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais - stars Jason Statham as the leader of a gang of thieves who bite off more than they can chew. When car dealer and one-time crook Terry Leather is approached by his old flame Martine Love with a proposition that would put his money worries behind him for good, he jumps at the chance. Leather quickly assembles a team which digs a tunnel directly into a London bank's vault. But what he hasn't been told is that, in addition to the money, he'll also be stealing a safety box containing material that would be extremely damaging to the royal family if it saw the light of day. Another box they take holds further dramatic revelations concerning establishment figures. So it's not long before Leather and the gang are pursued by the police, MI5 and various thugs, all keen to get their hands on the incendiary information... Edited for sexual scenes(n)

programme.title: I'm Dying Up Here
programme.desc: The Return. Goldie pitches an idea her lover/lawyer Eli believes he can sell; Nick returns to Goldie's after a long and mysterious hiatus; Adam begins a new handyman job and quickly learns there is more to the gig than was promised; Ralph is visited by a Vietnam buddy(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Jean-François Richet's remake of John Carpenter's 1976 cult classic rivals the original for tension and action. Ethan Hawke plays Jake Roenick, a police sergeant in charge of closing down defunct cop shop Precinct 13 with old timer Jasper O'Shea and secretary Iris Ferry. But a bus taking drugs lord Marion Bishop to prison is caught up in traffic chaos and he and the other prisoners are dumped on Roenick and his team. Bishop is due to give evidence that would expose cop corruption at the highest level and when Marcus Duvall, one of those under threat, finds out where Bishop is being held, he gathers a gang to take him out. And only Roenick and his rag-bag collection of cons, cops and civilians can stop them(n)

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple take their friends on a pre-wedding party getaway that turns murderous as guests are killed off one at a time(n)

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Omar Naim's science-fiction thriller is set in a world where Zoe memory implants capture every memory. Retrieved after the subject's death, the implant is sent to a 'Cutter' for editing into a two-hour video for the bereaved. Alan Harkman is one of the best in the business and is hired by Jennifer Bannister to edit the memory of her husband, who was CEO of the company that developed Zoe. He also abused children, including their daughter, areas Harkman erases until he sees a face from his own past that sends him on his own quest. There is also a subplot with a rebel Cutter, Fletcher, who belongs to a group that believes the implants inhibit natural human expression, and wants Bannister's implant for their own reasons. This intelligent film was released in the same year as the similarly themed Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind and The Manchurian Candidate but received a surprisingly limited release in Britain; this is a rare chance to enjoy it(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: In this historical drama set during the Cold War, a Brooklyn attorney (Tom Hanks) is tasked with negotiating a prisoner exchange between an American pilot who was shot down over the USSR and a Soviet spy serving a 45-year sentence for espionage against the U.S. Bridge of Spies was directed by Steven Spielberg and written by Matt Charman and Joel and Ethan Coen(n)

programme.title: Snowden

The film traces Snowden's career in both the NSA and CIA as he becomes disillusioned with his work and receives support from his idealistic girlfriend(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Feeling that they are doing God's will, two Catholic men from Boston set out to kill everyone in this Reservoir Dogs-style vigilante thriller. Brothers Conner and Murphy MacManus (Sean Patrick Flanery and Norman Reedus) take to performing their divine duty against the Russian mob. They massacre a bunch of unsuspecting Mafioso in a scene of absurd violence, then they let more blood in a mass killing of porn-shop customers. Instead of getting thrown in jail, they are dubbed "saints" by the Boston Herald, and they are praised by brilliant, tortured, and gay FBI agent Paul Smecker (Willem Dafoe)(n)

programme.desc: A look at the 1976 Indiana Hoosiers basketball team, led by coach Bobby Knight, that posted a perfect 32-0 record on their way to winning the NCAA national championship(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: Computer-animated tale about dinosaurs that embark on a perilous journey to a far-off paradise following a meteor shower(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: (2004) Michel Gondry's film, co-scripted with Charlie Kaufman (Adaptation, Being John Malkovich), is a fascinating melange of romance, fantasy and illusion. Joel Barish (Jim Carrey) and Clementine Kruczynski (Kate Winslet) were once madly in love, but their affair has gone stale. And when they meet again by chance, she doesn't just blank him, she genuinely doesn't know him. Then Joel finds out the truth: using a new and highly experimental technology, she is having her memories of him erased from her brain. In revenge, he's determined to undergo the same process but, as dodgy scientist Dr Howard Mierzwiak (Tom Wilkinson) begins the procedure, Joel changes his mind. Can he hang on to enough memories to win Clementine back? M,W,R,S,(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Desperate to gain the acceptance of his wealthier peers at a prep school, a working-class teen establishes a cocaine pipeline and becomes a drug dealer. This intense crime drama is based on true events that caused a national scandal in the mid-'80s(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell the Damn Joke
programme.desc: Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with a comedy special that holds no punches and calls it like it is(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: Jazzman Chet Baker must relearn his craft in the late '60s after his front teeth are knocked out during a mugging. As he strives to get his career back on track and overcome his heroin addiction, he receives support from his new girlfriend, an actress who was cast to play his lover in a movie about his life(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: In 1872 Wyoming, a Civil War veteran-turned-gunslinger (Kiefer Sutherland) must make amends with his estranged father (Donald Sutherland), a reverend who deplores his son's embrace of violence, as he tries to protect his hometown from ruthless land-grabbers. Jon Cassar directed this menacing Western, which also stars Demi Moore and Brian Cox. Forsaken received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: In this nail-biting international thriller, a couple (Owen Wilson and Lake Bell) and their two daughters relocate to Asia, only to find themselves caught in the middle of a dangerous coup. Realizing that foreigners are being murdered on the spot, they make a desperate decision to escape the violence on the streets and seek refuge at the American Embassy, all while trying to avoid detection by the merciless rebels. Directed by John Erick Dowdle. Pierce Brosnan co-stars(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: Recently released from prison after serving time for a crime he didn't commit, Mo realizes that the rest of his community still sees him as a threat. He soon bonds with a woman trapped in an abusive relationship in this searing drama(n)

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Jim Carrey and Ewan McGregor star in this comedy from Glenn Ficarra and John Requa. Steven Russell seems to be the ultimate wholesome family man: he plays the organ at church, celebrates good news with a nice glass of healthy milk and prays nightly beside his blonde, blue-eyed wife(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection

programme.title: Boulevard
programme.desc: When a middle-aged man stuck in a comfortable but dull life befriends a young gay hustler, he must come to terms with the secret that's been hovering beneath the surface of his marriage. Robin Williams' final on-screen performance(n)

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Omar Naim's science-fiction thriller is set in a world where Zoe memory implants capture every memory. Retrieved after the subject's death, the implant is sent to a 'Cutter' for editing into a two-hour video for the bereaved. Alan Harkman is one of the best in the business and is hired by Jennifer Bannister to edit the memory of her husband, who was CEO of the company that developed Zoe. He also abused children, including their daughter, areas Harkman erases until he sees a face from his own past that sends him on his own quest. There is also a subplot with a rebel Cutter, Fletcher, who belongs to a group that believes the implants inhibit natural human expression, and wants Bannister's implant for their own reasons. This intelligent film was released in the same year as the similarly themed Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind and The Manchurian Candidate but received a surprisingly limited release in Britain; this is a rare chance to enjoy it(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: A Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world(n)

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A troubled musician becomes an au pair for a lonely 12-year-old cello prodigy, setting the stage for a friendship that leads to profound healing for both of them in this warmhearted drama(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate with few job prospects is hired to care for a precocious four-year-old boy in this satirical urban comedy starring Scarlett Johansson, Paul Giamatti, Laura Linney, and Chris Evans. Annie Braddock (Johansson) is attempting to put her anthropology degree to good use in New York City with little success to show for her efforts. When a posh Upper East Side couple enlists Annie's aid in caring for their preschool-aged son, Annie's entire perspective is forever changed as she attempts to adjust to her new surroundings, shares a romance with a wealthy native boy, and strives to teach her charge the true meaning of happiness(n)

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Mike Leigh wrote and directed this moving portrait of a working-class South London family in crisis(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: The lone survivor of a brutal massacre struggles to reclaim her life(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo, who begins to surprise the couple with unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: The combination of romance and zombies comedy seems unfeasible... unless it falls into the hands of the brilliant Edgar Wright, co-creator with Simon Pegg (scriptwriter of Zombies Party) of the Spaced series, a milestone in recent British television. In this macabre story, Shaun (Simon Pegg) is down in the dumps, going through an unstoppable crisis in his life. About to turn 30, he passes the time in The Winchester bar, dislikes his job, argues with his mother every day, and the relationship with his girlfriend, Liz (Kate Ashfield), worsens by the hour. When she finally leaves him, Shaun decides, once and for all, to do something about his life. His first step is not visiting a psychologist, but confronting an invasion of living dead with just two weapons: a cricket bat and a shovel! Zombies Party is -at the same time- a parody and a tribute to zombie films(n)

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Six female adrenaline junkies get more than they bargained for when a rock fall leaves them trapped inside an uncharted cave system with a breed of hungry flesh-eaters(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: A group of campers hunker down in a medieval Turkish town and play a mysterious party game that quickly escalates into something far more sinister(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment. (Followed By World Forecast)(n)

programme.title: Kill Kane
programme.desc: A family man seeks revenge when his wife and children are murdered by infamous gangsters(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A desperate thief has just 12 hours to steal $10 million and save his daughter from his vengeful former partner in this fast-paced action thriller reuniting Nicolas Cage and director Simon West (Con Air, The Expendables 2). Determined to get the payout for a major heist gone awry, a degenerate criminal (Josh Lucas) kidnaps the daughter (Sami Gayle) of his one-time partner-in-crime (Cage), and threatens her life if he doesn't have the money in 12 hours. Now, with the clock ticking and his daughter trapped in a random taxi being driven around New Orleans, the frantic ex-con enlists the help of a former associate (Malin Akerman) to help pull off the heist that will save his little girl's life. Danny Huston and M.C. Gainey also star(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: After an all-night beach party, a group of friends wake up to find some of them are missing, and the survivors think that they might be victims of a flesh-eating creature hiding in the sand(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A former Los Angeles DA inspector (Chiwetel Ejiofor) spends 13 years hunting the killer who raped and murdered the teen daughter of his colleague (Julia Roberts). But when he finds the culprit and the district attorney (Nicole Kidman) refuses to reopen the case, he is forced to pursue justice on his own, which ultimately leads to a shocking discovery. This English-language remake of Juan José Campanella's 2009 Argentinian film of the same name was written and directed by Billy Ray(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Humanitarian-aid workers attempt to save a community's water supply in the war-torn Balkans of 1995, but their mission is complicated by bureaucratic indifference and the possibility that any situation could erupt in sudden violence(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Four teens living in inner-city Cleveland (Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Moisés Arias, Rafi Gavron, and Ezri Walker) steal cars to support their dream of becoming pro skateboarders, and discover a large stash of pills during one heist. When they decide to sell the drugs themselves, they are targeted by an organic-food proprietor who's secretly a local crime boss (Linda Emond). Michael Kenneth Williams and Erykah Badu co-star. Steven Caple Jr. wrote and directed this crime drama, which made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Program
programme.desc: Eastern State University isn't particularly notable for anything except its football program. Lately, even that hasn't been doing too well, and the athletic staff led by Coach Winters (James Caan) are under considerable pressure by the administration and alumni to bring in a winning season. To do that, he has to recruit some able, promising young players out of high school. It's not too surprising to learn that he will do almost anything to get these kids, and its even less surprising that, as long as they keep producing on the field, he and the college will overlook almost any obnoxious behavior the boys can perpetrate to the limit of their ability(n)

The two father figures - one hard-working and loving, the other involved in dangerous, underworld activities - exert conflicting pressures and beliefs(n)

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Dave Brown is an LA cop on the edge. He's constantly under suspicion (and with good reason) from internal affairs, and he's recently been caught on video assaulting a black man. programme.title: Blue Jasmine
programme.desc: Woody Allen trades New York City for San Francisco with his comedy-drama Blue Jasmine, starring Cate Blanchett as a troubled former Manhattanite who moves to the City by the Bay to live with her sister after her wealthy husband divorces her. Forced to put her life back together piece by piece while under the effect of powerful anti-depressants, she dates a series of men, attempts to build a career, and slowly learns how to count on herself to survive. Alec Baldwin, Louis C.K., and Bobby Cannavale co-star(n)

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door. A young couple has just moved into their California dream home when they become the target of their next-door neighbour, who disapproves of their relationship. A stern, single father, this tightly wound LAPD officer has appointed himself the watchdog of the neighbourhood. His nightly foot patrols and overly watchful eyes bring comfort to some, but he becomes increasingly aggressive to the newlyweds. These persistent intrusions into their lives cause the couple to fight back(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: In this riveting sci-fi romance, two passengers aboard a spacecraft traveling to a distant planet are brought out of suspended animation by a technical glitch—90 years before the vessel is due to reach its destination. Together, they must investigate the malfunction that awakened them, which could threaten the safety of the ship(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: A wealthy tycoon whose life is orderly and happy finds his household disrupted by the arrival of a young man called Joe Black. His daughter falls for the young man innocent of the fact that Joe is Death, visiting Earth to take the life of her father..(n)

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: A lazy stoner is the sole witness to a murder by an evil drug lord and a corrupt cop. Marked for death, he runs for his life, dragging his dazed dealer and his supplier with him on a hilarious pot-fueled adventure(n)

programme.title: Sexy Beast
programme.desc: Gary (Ray Winstone) is a former gangster who has made a modest amount of money from his criminal career. Happy to put his life of crime behind him, he has retired with his wife Deedee (Amanda Redman) to the sunny bliss of rural Spain, where he lives an idyllic life with his family and a few close friends. But Gary's contentment is ruptured by an unwelcome visitor from his past -- Don (Ben Kingsley), a former associate who has been hired to assemble a team of criminals to rob a heavily guarded bank. Don wants Gary in on the job, and is less than pleased by Gary's unwillingness to volunteer his services. What ensues is a battle of wills between the two men, with Don intimidating, prodding, and manipulating his onetime friend to get what he wants, forever changing the lives of those around him in the process(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: The violent rise of gangland power in New York City at a time of massive political corruption and the city's evolution into a cultural melting pot set the stage for this lavish historical epic, which director Martin Scorsese finally brought to the screen almost 30 years after he first began to plan the project. In 1846, as waves of Irish immigrants poured into the New York neighborhood of Five Points, a number of citizens of British and Dutch heritage who were born in the United States began making an open display of their resentment toward the new arrivals. William Cutting (Daniel Day-Lewis), better known as "Bill the Butcher" for his deadly skill with a knife, bands his fellow "Native Americans" into a gang to take on the Irish immigrants; the immigrants in turn form a gang of their own, "The Dead Rabbits," organized by Priest Vallon (Liam Neeson). After an especially bloody clash between the Natives and the Rabbits leaves Vallon dead, his son goes missing; the boy ends up in a brutal reform school before returning to the Five Points in 1862 as Amsterdam (Leonardo DiCaprio). Now a strapping adult who has learned how to fight, Amsterdam has come to seek vengeance against Bill the Butcher, whose underworld control of the Five Points through violence and intimidation dovetails with the open corruption of New York politician "Boss" Tweed (Jim Broadbent). Amsterdam gradually penetrates Bill the Butcher's inner circle, and he soon becomes his trusted assistant. Amsterdam also finds himself falling for Jenny Everdeane (Cameron Diaz), a beautiful but street-smart thief who was once involved with Bill. Amsterdam is learning a great deal from Bill, but before he can turn the tables on the man who killed his father, Amsterdam's true identity is exposed, even though he has concealed it from nearly everyone, including Jenny. Gangs Of New York was the first film in two years from actor Leonardo DiCaprio; ironically, it was at one time scheduled to open on the same day as Catch Me if You Can, the Steven Spielberg project that DiCaprio began filming immediately after Gangs wrapped(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs

Six criminals - all with pseudonyms, and strangers to one another - are hired for a diamond robbery, but they are ambushed by police and forced to shoot their way out. At their warehouse rendezvous, the survivors, realising they were set up, try to find the traitor in their midst as this controversial exploration of betrayal moves inexorably to its blood-soaked climax(n)

Nick ends up going to Hollywood with his young son (Cameron Bright) in order to get a movie producer to include characters smoking in his newest film. Nick is kidnapped by a vigilante group concerned about the harmful nature of his product. The cast includes William H. Macy as a Senator who runs on a strong anti-tobacco position, Rob Lowe as the Hollywood bigwig, and Robert Duvall as the king of the tobacco industry. programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran and his young wife fall prey to a malevolent rural cult comprised of murderous children in this adaptation of the terrifying short story by literary horror icon Stephen King. Unbeknownst to them, this idyllic farming community has been overtaken by an unspeakable evil. Under the wicked influence of adolescent evangelist Isaac and his sickle-wielding henchman Malachi, the children of Gatlin have sacrificed every adult in town to He Who Walks Behind the Rows. Now it's Burt and Vicki's turn(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Showdown with Rance McGrew. Larry Blyden stars in this hilarious Twilight Zone entry as egocentric TV western star Rance McGrew, who, while filming a fight scene, is knocked cold by a prop bottle. Upon awakening, Rance finds himself in the real west, circa 1880 -- and at the mercy of none other than Jesse James (Arch Johnson). It seems that old Jesse isn't too thrilled as to how he and his fellow outlaws have been depicted on Rance's series, and he intends to teach the vainglorious actor a lesson. Best line: "And you won an Emmy? Shoot, you can't act any better than you can draw!" This episode reunited two alumni of the classic 1951 sci-fi thriller The Thing: actor Robert Cornthwaite, and director Christian Nyby. Scripted by Rod Serling from an idea by Frederic Louis Fox (which in its original form wasn't a comedy at all), "Showdown with Rance McGrew" first aired February 2, 1962(n)

Which is ideal for a band of vampires, led by Marlow, who use the seasonal gloom as an opportunity to descend on the town to feast. Local sheriff Eben Oleson and his estranged wife Stella lead a small group of survivors who hole up in a secret hideout. But, with supplies running out and the vampires closing in, can they stay hidden or must they risk taking on the undead? David Slade's all-action, visceral horror film mixes fast-moving action with claustrophobic tension as the body count rises and the days slowly pass(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One After Vegas. Was the fifth-season finale of Friends merely a misleading "teaser," or did Ross (David Schwimmer) and Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) really get married during the gang's tumultuous trip to Las Vegas? The answer, provided in the series' season-six opener, is both "no" and "yes": no, it wasn't a tease, and yes, Ross and Rachel are husband and wife (though having been drunk during the ceremony, it takes them a while to become aware of the fact!). Elsewhere on the romantic scene, Monica (Courteney Cox) and Chandler (Matthew Perry), upon returning to New York, decide to move in together, even though (unlike Ross and Rachel) their planned Vegas wedding never came off. And poor Joey (Matt LeBlanc) is also back in town, his latest "big break" in show business having blown up in his face, obliging him to head back to the Big Apple with feckless Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow) at the wheel. The hilarious "hyphenated" closing credits of this episode reflect the recent marriage of Courteney Cox and actor David Arquette(n)

programme.desc: In this thrilling and nail-biting entry in the Divergent series, Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews(n)

programme.title: Will
programme.desc: Cowards Die Many Times. Will is plagued with guilt over the arrest of a rival playwright, and he makes a dangerous confession to the sightly, rebellious Alice. Also: The future of the theatre is jeopardized when another playhouse tempts a popular actor(n)

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A future soldier repeatedly relives his own death as he is killed defending Earth from aliens. Shaken, he seeks the help of a celebrated female warrior in order to defeat the extraterrestrials and save mankind(n)
